page.title: 20Mrs Thatcher in Talke
page.content: Mrs Thatcher is the Prime Minister, who lives in London. Stephen Spence is a pupil at Hill Top, but there is more to Stephen that meets the eye. He is an impressionist. He went to Prestatyn, Royal Lido, on the 7th of September to "make Buster Laugh". He did an impression of Gladys Pugh off the "Hi de hi" television programme, and also Margaret Thatcher. This is what he said, "Dennis get me a glass of whisky or else I'll pull your teeth out with one of your golf clubs." Two hundred and ninety people were judged and Stephen made it to the final and won. The prizes were twenty five pounds, a trophy to keep for a year and a replica for himself. I.P.C. magazines also sponsored a years subscription to the "Buster" comic.
